long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 22Digital Group connect makes it easier to manage members of your Facebook group. It connects to your 22Digital account to determine which members should have access to the group and which ones should be removed. It changes color of the names of the members (depending on their status) right on your Facebook group page. This makes it much easier to remove those that no longer should have access.
